quotes.author: Dolly Parton
quotes.title: The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.

quotes.author: Dalai Lama
quotes.title: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.title: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.title: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
